Package com.github.triceo.robozonky.api.notifications

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Event
    Marker interface for an event that may be fired any time during RoboZonky's runtime.
    EventListener<E extends Event>
    Implement in user code to allow handling @Events.
    ListenerService
    Use Java's ServiceLoader to load EventListeners
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ExecutionCompletedEvent
    Fired immediately after the strategy has finished evaluating loans and making investments.
    ExecutionStartedEvent
    Fired immediately before the loans are submitted for evaluation by strategy.
    InvestmentDelegatedEvent
    Fired immediately after ConfirmationProvider delegated a given investment.
    InvestmentMadeEvent
    Fired immediately after an investment was submitted to the API.
    InvestmentRejectedEvent
    Fired immediately after ConfirmationProvider rejected a given investment.
    InvestmentRequestedEvent
    Fired immediately before ZonkyApi.invest(Investment) call is made or, in case of dry run, immediately before such a call would otherwise be made.
    LoanArrivedEvent
    Fired immediately after @MarketplaceCheckStartedEvent, when a loan is present.
    LoanRecommendedEvent
    Fired immediately after InvestmentStrategy has recommended a particular loan.
    MarketplaceCheckCompletedEvent
    Fired immediately after the marketplace is checked for new loans.
    MarketplaceCheckStartedEvent
    Fired immediately before the marketplace is checked for new loans.
    RoboZonkyCrashedEvent
    Fired before the application forcibly terminates due to an error.
    RoboZonkyEndingEvent
    Fired before the application shuts down, provided RoboZonkyInitializedEvent was fired before.
    RoboZonkyInitializedEvent
    Fired after the application has been properly configured and is ready for marketplace check.
    RoboZonkyStartingEvent
    Fired immediately after RoboZonky's acquired exclusive lock and is going to initialize.
    StrategyCompletedEvent
    Fired immediately after all loans have been evaluated and all possible investment operations performed.
    StrategyStartedEvent
    Fired before any loans are submitted for evaluation by the strategy and subsequent investment operations.
